PaladinCantrips.Name: Blade Ward
PaladinCantrips.Description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

PaladinCantrips.Name: Light
PaladinCantrips.Description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

PaladinCantrips.Name: Sacred Flame
PaladinCantrips.Description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage.

PaladinCantrips.Name: Spare the Dying
PaladinCantrips.Description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable.

PaladinCantrips.Name: Thaumaturgy
PaladinCantrips.Description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range.
